mapper.select: SELECT consultant_id,name,professional_info FROM Consultants WHERE consultant_id IN (SELECT consultant_id FROM ConsultantDailyAvailability UNION SELECT consultant_id FROM CurrentAvailability)
SELECT consultant_id,name,professional_info FROM Consultants WHERE consultant_id IN (SELECT consultant_id FROM ConsultantDailyAvailability WHERE available_date=#{date})
SELECT consultant_id,name,professional_info FROM Consultants WHERE consultant_id IN (SELECT consultant_id FROM CurrentAvailability)

SELECT cs.available_date,hour_8_available,hour_9_available,hour_10_available,hour_11_available,hour_12_available FROM ConsultantSchedules cs JOIN ConsultantDailyAvailability cd ON cs.consultant_id=cd.consultant_id AND cs.available_date=cd.available_date WHERE cs.consultant_id=#{id} AND start_time=8

SELECT cs.available_date,hour_13_available,hour_14_available,hour_15_available,hour_16_available,hour_17_available FROM ConsultantSchedules cs JOIN ConsultantDailyAvailability cd ON cs.consultant_id=cd.consultant_id AND cs.available_date=cd.available_date WHERE cs.consultant_id=#{id} AND start_time=13

SELECT consultant_id,name,professional_info FROM Consultants WHERE employed=true
AND supervisor_id=#{supervisorId}

SELECT cs.consultant_id,c.name, SUM(CASE WHEN cs.session_status='completed' THEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, cs.start_time, cs.end_time) ELSE 0 END)/60 AS total_time FROM ConsultationSessions cs INNER JOIN Consultants c ON cs.consultant_id=c.consultant_id WHERE start_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE(), '%Y-%m-01') AND LAST_DAY(CURRENT_DATE()) GROUP BY c.consultant_id ORDER BY total_time DESC
